At an event regarding training last week at U.S. Steel 's Irvin Plant southeast of Pittsburgh , I joined U.S. Steel CEO Mario Longhi in calling for trade regulation enforcement .
A trade case involving the steel used in shale gas drilling , called Oil Country Tubular Goods ( OCTG ) , is an example of how enforcement can level the playing field .
In 2008 , China dumped more than 2 million tons of OCTG into the U.S. market .
